name: Square Heroes
description: Join the Galactic Tournament in this fast-paced comical action shooter. Level-up your Hero and unlock an arsenal of weapons. Lay waste to your friends and foes in local, LAN and online multiplayer matches, or hone your skills in single player and custom games.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows: XP (SP3), Vista, 7, 8 or 10 Processor: Any with 2 or more Cores Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: ATI or NVIDIA with at least 256MB, Intel GMA 950 and above DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 256 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows: XP (SP3), Vista, 7, 8 or 10 Processor: Any with 2 or more Cores Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: ATI or NVIDIA with at least 512MB, Intel HD 4000 and above DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
